title: America chips in
description:
The semiconductor was invented in the United States and the country once dominated global manufacturing. Now the Biden administration is spending $52 billion to get back to the top. Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil explains.
Read Rebecca’s story: https://www.vox.com/recode/23048906/chip-shortage-manufacturing-america-biden
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan, engineered by Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions), and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
